name: I Flew on Indonesia's WORST Airline and Instantly Regretted It.
description:
Thanks to Established Titles for sponsoring this video! Go to https://establishedtitles.com/noel to shop their Black Friday Sale, plus get an additional 10% off on any purchase. They've planted over 2 million trees with their partnership with Trees for the Future https://trees.org/sponsor/established-titles/

I took a flight on an Indonesian airline I'd never heard of on a 40 year old plane after my flight got cancelled - and ended up regretting every minute of it.
